text: Daniel Robin (31 May 1943 – 23 May 2018) was a French wrestler. He was born in Bron, Rhône. He was 1968 Olympic silver medalist in both Freestyle wrestling and Greco-Roman wrestling, and competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics. He won a gold medal at the 1967 World Wrestling Championships. Robin died on 23 May 2018 in Longueuil, Canada at the age of 74.Le lutteur grenoblois Daniel Robin est mort == References == Category:1943 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Wrestlers Category:Olympians for France Category:1972 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1968 Summer Olympics
title: Daniel Robin
